ca.ualberta.cs.corgFuViews

Class OfflineDataView

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • ca.ualberta.cs.corgFuViews.OfflineDataView

  • public class OfflineDataView
extends Activity
    The activity that contains the data that has been made offline and been made to view offline such as the users authored questions, viewed, favorited and chosen to read later
    Author:
    Ahmed
